document.full_text: india's economy grew at its slowest annual pace in five quarters in january to march, as rising interest rates crimped consumption and investment, which some analysts say could temper the pace of central bank tightening to tackle inflation.
document.title: india's economy grows slowest in five quarters
lines_and_colors: india's economy grew at its slowest annual pace in five quarters in january to march, as rising interest rates crimped consumption and investment, which some analysts say could temper the pace of central bank tightening to tackle inflation.
